common.description: 연체에서 배분 항목 관리 정보 조회

io.name: TCISUPIA0010101_INBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:TCISUPIA0010101_inbound" /> <complexType name="TCISUPIA0010101_inbound"> <sequence> <element name="odueMngAreaCd"> <annotation> <documentation>연체관리지역코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="2" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="aptmCd"> <annotation> <documentation>배분코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="5" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

io.name: TCISUPIA0010101_OUTBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:TCISUPIA0010101_outbound" /> <complexType name="TCISUPIA0010101_outbound"> <sequence> <element name="aptmClasMngLstRowcount"> <annotation> <documentation>배분항목관리목록건수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="5" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="aptmClasMngLstList" type="tns:APTM_CLAS_MNG_LST_LIST_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>배분항목관리목록</documentation> <appinfo> <p:adjustLength category="variableField" lengthFieldURL="APTM_CLAS_MNG_LST_ROWCOUNT" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="APTM_CLAS_MNG_LST_LIST_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="aptmCd"> <annotation> <documentation>배분코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="5" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="aptmCd1"> <annotation> <documentation>배분코드1</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="5" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="aptmClasNm"> <annotation> <documentation>배분항목명</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> base="string"> <maxLength value="100" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="odueAptmCsfCd"> <annotation> <documentation>연체배분분류코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="연체 배분 분류의 코드" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="2" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="odueMngAreaCd"> <annotation> <documentation>연체관리지역코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="2" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="priorRank"> <annotation> <documentation>우선순위</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> name="aptmStrtOdueMths"> <annotation> <documentation>배분시작연체개월수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="11" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="aptmEndOdueMths"> <annotation> <documentation>배분종료연체개월수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="19" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="aplyGbcd"> <annotation> <documentation>적용구분코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="aptmClasCntn"> <annotation> <documentation>배분항목내용</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="100" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="aptmMthdCd"> <annotation> <documentation>배분방법코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" />
